Description:
Family Home in the Doncaster Secondary Zone
This double story home home with street frontage is within superb proximity to Doncaster Shopping Centre, the freeway and to Doncaster Secondary College, this exclusive home is also neighbours to plenty of outdoor recreational parks including Koonung Creek Linear Park, Tram Road Reserve and Marshall Avenue Reserve, whilst also benefiting from bus services.

The kitchen features a selection of quality appliances, an island bench and timber cabinetry makes this kitchen a social space and one with enormous capabilities with keeping up with busy household needs. Another bathroom also occupies the first floor and it's from this level that the views are best appreciated, with an outlook over to Box Hill, and on clear days, cityscape views can be seen.
Added features include ducted heating, ducted vacuum, a low maintenance block with a paved courtyard, and a single garage which has private internal access.
